name: Roll Over (Takago)
description:
*Reading parts of this description is essential to understanding the game.

Roll over is a game about a rolling dice dog named Lucky who gets in trouble with fire breathing pawns, spinning spiky tops and our lost marbles (while doing the jam). When he rolls, the number that is facing up when Lucky gets hit will cause either blessing or curses for him. Survive as long as possible to get the highest score (which you can post below in the comments). White dice represents your current number on top and the blue dice represents your health. Also, NO DIAGONAL ROLLING. When doing a horizontal roll, you switch between the numbers 1, 2 and 3. When doing a vertical roll, you switch between 4, 5 and 6 (the 2nd tutorial screen isn't correct and the HORIZONTAL ROLL NUMBERS AND VERTICAL ROLL NUMBERS ARE REVERESED)

Credits:

Takago - Programmer, Lead Game Designer

Miyaki - Pixel Artist, SFX Artist

sproutser.art - Vector Artist, Music Composer
